languages.text: "Разумеется. Кровь пролилась еще до того, как мы ступили на планету, где назначена встреча. Я предвкушаю мгновение, когда мои клинки утонут в плоти моих сородичей... или когда они склонятся передо мной". {n}Смех становится животным и утробным.{/n} "О да, я получу удовольствие от этого маленького приключения. Вперед же, {name}. Не стоит затягивать".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется. Кровь пролилась еще до того, как мы ступили на планету, где назначена встреча. Я предвкушаю мгновение, когда мои клинки утонут в плоти моих сородичей... или когда они склонятся передо мной". {n}Смех становится животным и утробным.{/n} "О да, я получу удовольствие от этого маленького приключения. Вперед же, {name}. Не стоит затягивать".

languages.text: "Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Кровь пролилась еще до того, как мы ступили на планету, где назначена встреча. Я предвкушаю мгновение, когда мои клинки утонут в плоти моих сородичей... или когда они склонятся передо мной". {n}Смех становится животным и утробным.{/n} "О да, я получу удовольствие от этого маленького приключения. Вперед же, {name}. Не стоит затягивать".

traits.locale_text: "Of course. The blood was spilled long before we stepped on the planet where the meeting is going to take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kinsmen... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Tarry not, {name}. Let us delay it no longer."

"Of course. The blood was spilled long before we stepped on the planet where the meeting is going to take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kinsmen... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Tarry not, {name}. Let us delay it no longer."

Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

"Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

"Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

languages.text: "Natürlich. Das Blut wurde schon lange vergossen. Lange vor unserer Ankunft auf dem Planeten, auf dem das Treffen stattfindet. Ich freue mich darauf, meine Klingen in das Fleisch meiner Verwandten zu rammen ... oder sie vor mir knien zu sehen." {n}Das Lachen wird kehliger.{/n} "Oh ja, dieses kleine Abenteuer wird mir Freude bereiten. Kommt, {name}. Trödeln wir nicht länger."
languages.original_text: "Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Das Blut wurde schon lange vergossen. Lange vor unserer Ankunft auf dem Planeten, auf dem das Treffen stattfindet. Ich freue mich darauf, meine Klingen in das Fleisch meiner Verwandten zu rammen ... oder sie vor mir knien zu sehen." {n}Das Lachen kommt von immer aus der Kehle.{/n} "Oh ja, dieses kleine Abenteuer wird mir Freude bereiten. Kommt, {name}. Trödeln wir nicht länger."

languages.text: “当然，早在我们还没踏上即将举行会议的行星，血就已经流出来了。我非常期待把刀锋刺进我同胞的肉里……或是看着他们在我面前跪下。”{n}玛拉斋的笑声变成了喉音。{/n}“噢，没错，我要好好享受这场小小的冒险。走吧，{name}，别再拖延了。”
languages.original_text: "Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

traits.locale_text: “当然，早在我们还没踏上即将举行会议的行星，血就已经流出来了。我非常期待把刀锋刺进我同胞的肉里……或是看着他们在我面前跪下。”{n}玛拉斋的笑声变成了喉音。{/n}“噢，没错，我要好好享受这场小小的冒险。走吧，{name}，别再拖延了。”

languages.text: « Bien entendu. Du sang a été versé bien avant notre arrivée sur la planète où la rencontre aura lieu. J'ai hâte de plonger mes lames dans la chair des miens... ou de les voir ployer le genou devant moi, {n}glousse-t-il d'un rire guttural.{/n} Oh oui, cette petite aventure va être un vrai plaisir. Venez, {name}. Inutile de tarder. »
languages.original_text: "Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu. Du sang a été versé bien avant notre arrivée sur la planète où la rencontre aura lieu. J'ai hâte de plonger mes lames dans la chair des miens... ou de les voir ployer le genou devant moi, {n}glousse-t-il d'un rire guttural.{/n} Oh oui, cette petite aventure va être un vrai plaisir. Venez, {name}. Inutile de tarder. »

languages.text: «Desde luego. La sangre ha sido derramada mucho antes de que llegáramos al planeta de la reunión. Tengo ganas de clavar mis hojas en la carne de mis congéneres... o de verlos arrodillarse ante mí». {n}La risa se vuelve gutural.{/n} «Sí, voy a disfrutar mucho con esta aventura. Vamos, {name}. No nos retrasemos más».
languages.original_text: "Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego. La sangre ha sido derramada mucho antes de que llegáramos al planeta de la reunión. Tengo ganas de clavar mis hojas en la carne de mis congéneres... o de verlos arrodillarse ante mí». {n}La risa se vuelve gutural.{/n} «Sí, voy a disfrutar mucho con esta aventura. Vamos, {name}. No nos retrasemos más».

languages.text: 「もちろんだ。合流する予定の惑星だが、そこは俺たちが足を踏み入れるずっと前に、血が分かれてたのさ。同族の肉に自身の剣を突き刺すか…それとも奴らを俺の前でひざまずかせるか。今から楽しみだ」{n}耳障りな笑い声が上がる。{/n}「そうさ、俺様はこのささやかな冒険を楽しませてもらう。来い、{name}。これ以上遅らせるな」
languages.original_text: "Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだ。合流する予定の惑星だが、そこは俺たちが足を踏み入れるずっと前に、血が分かれてたのさ。同族の肉に自身の剣を突き刺すか…それとも奴らを俺の前でひざまずかせるか。今から楽しみだ」{n}耳障りな笑い声が上がる。{/n}「そうさ、俺様はこのささやかな冒険を楽しませてもらう。来い、{name}。これ以上遅らせるな」

languages.text: "Elbette. Kan, buluşmanın gerçekleşeceği gezegene daha biz adım atmadan çok önce dökülmüş. Kılıçlarımı soydaşlarımın bedenine geçirmek, olmadı önümde diz çöktüklerini görmek için sabırsızlanıyorum." {n}Gülüşü, hırıltılı bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Ya, bu küçük maceranın tadını çıkaracağım. Gel {name}. Daha fazla beklemeyelim."
languages.original_text: "Of course. The blood was spilt long before we set foot on the planet where the meeting will take place. I look forward to sinking my blades into the flesh of my kin... or to seeing them kneel before me." {n}The laughter becomes guttural.{/n} "Oh yes, I am going to enjoy this little adventure. Come, {name}. Let us delay no longer."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette. Kan, buluşmanın gerçekleşeceği gezegene daha biz adım atmadan çok önce dökülmüş. Kılıçlarımı soydaşlarımın bedenine geçirmek için sabırsızlanıyorum. Veya önümde diz çöktüklerini görmek için." {n}Gülüşü hırıltılı bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Ah, evet, bu küçük maceranın tadını çıkaracağım. Gel {name}. Daha fazla beklemeyelim."
